website_summaries.verdict: This warm, waterproof jacket has a functional hood that actually stays on your head, even if you're wearing a bun or ponytail.
pros: Windproof, waterproof, and breathable with seam seals and adjustable storm hood
It's not bulky, but it's insulated and has pockets for all your small accessories
cons: It has no armpit zips or venting, and it may run small
keep this in mind when ordering, especially if you want to layer

customer_reviews.title: Great cute warm jacket! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Wore this to Yellowstone National Park in December with long shirt underneath. I was very warm. The jacket is of high quality and the pockets are nice. There is a hood and nice snow bib inside the bottom of jacket. Lots of zipper pockets as well. I am 150 lbs and this large was perfect size as I wanted a little extra space for a fleece underneath. The medium I originally ordered fit but was too tight for a fleece underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Woodglen

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket, it is pretty warm for how lightweight it is and looks great. I agree with some other reviewers that it seems to keep you warmer when you are being active as opposed to when you are just standing or sitting somewhere. It has great wind protection and is waterproof. I wore it in 30 degree temperatures with a sweater underneath and was warm enough. I also agree that it runs a bit small. I am 5'7 137 pounds and ordered a large which I think fits perfectly. I have room to layer underneath comfortably but it doesn't feel too big with just a t-shirt underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS COAT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS COAT! This is my second Columbia coat and I love it even more. The color is awesome! The coat is extremely warm without being heavy. Fits tighter than my other Columbia coat, but I like it. Seems to keep the cold air out better.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Wise

customer_reviews.title: Woefully Undersized and Not Warm at All
customer_reviews.text: Woefully undersized. I’m 5’0, 118lbs, 36b chest area so I am petite. I bought the medium and if I wear a T-shirt underneath, it is tight. Not warm at all, more like a waterproof shell but there’s no way to layer underneath unless I get at least, the large or x-large. Very stiff and this jacket reminds me of when I get men’s clothing where it’s very tight against the chest with no room for a woman’s breasts, not even a small woman. Sleeves are also very narrow so again, hard to layer underneath. I would have returned but did not try on until months later. I’ll donate this one.
customer_reviews.author: badDog4

customer_reviews.title: Best choice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! I spent lots of time reviewing many different brands and trying them on. The Omni heat is an amazing feature! I would definitely Size up to wear extra layers or heavy sweaters underneath jacket. I wear a medium but sized up to a large in order to a little bit of extra room and I’m glad I did. You will not go wrong with this jacket. I wear it outside to shovel or out with a pair of jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Frenette

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had a good jacket in a while and this is the best ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a good jacket in a while and this is the best jacket I've ever had. I've never been warm in the cold (20F) before. Went skiing for the first time with this jacket and actually got a little too warm. I love it! I am about 5'4 and 125 lbs and I bought the Medium. It fits nicely and is flattering, but if I put my thumb in the stretchy "runners" hole and stretch my arms straight forward then it seems maybe a half an inch small. Although, I never use those so I don't worry about ripping them.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Stylish Enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go skiiing in the Andes, but also wore around while sight seeing in city and out in the desert. I was still chilly at times, though not because of the jacket specifically (more due to hands, face, legs). The jacket performed well in the snow. It also has plenty of pockets for phone, RFID ski pass, keys/cards, etc. It looked nice both on the slopes and while doing the rest of my traveling. I generally wear a small, but ordered the medium for a relaxed fit, which worked perfectly. (5'6, 125lbs)
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Stayed warm and dry!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket, it is sleeker and seems somewhat stylishly fit for a woman. It has zippered pockets which holds your items securely if you’re going skiing or snowboarding. I stayed so warm and did not get wet as I definitely fell in the snow many times ! I am 5’2” at 100 pounds and the xs fit perfectly. Anything more than my sweater shirt and snow bib underneath and it would have been too tight. I recommend this jacket! The hood not only zippers on and off but has a snug Velcro piece on it too .. loved it !
customer_reviews.author: Shire1022

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: (Ordered a SMALL in BLACK. My measurements are 32-26-36, 5’3”, and I weigh about 113-115lbs) Absolutely LOVE this jacket! I already had a Columbia jacket, but it was a trench style (to my knees) and I wanted something shorter and waterproof that I could take camping. This fits my needs perfectly! It has so many pockets, the zippers are excellent quality, it’s not too heavy but feels like I’ll for sure be warm, Omni-heat lining, etc! Got this for a steal so I’m super excited!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great All Around Snow Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This Columbia jacket has virtually all of the features I am looking for, plus one I hadn't even thought about. I only occasionally use a hood, so a zip-off hood is a must for me. It has the right number of pockets, a great high collar/neck warmer, not too long and not too short, lightweight warmth and tailored fit, snow skirt snaps back out of your way when you don't want it. The only thing I am missing from my other Columbia jacket is the neck protection at the top of the zipper. I usually wear a turtle neck anyway, so it's not that big a deal for me at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Word Company USA

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and sleek jacket.
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I got one of each (men's and women's) for our Iceland and Denmark trip in October/November 2016 time and it was fantastic. With some layers underneath, it kept us warm and mobile enough to go around adventuring outdoors (raining and snowing and windy out). Definitely waterproof which was what we were looking for. It's also quite stylish/sleek looking. The zippered pockets were surprisingly handy and the hood was adjustable enough for us. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Stone

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this for our daughter to wear skiing. ...

customer_reviews.author: mrstea

customer_reviews.title: Arm holes are so small you can't wear layers of clothing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. I typically wear layers during the winter. The arm holes are so small that you can wear only a T-shirt. I'm 5'5 and weigh 109 lbs and I bought the medium so it's disappointing. Also the inner material is like a space blanket and not breathable, so you definitely work up a sweat instead of staying warm and dry. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Hottie

customer_reviews.title: One Year Later, Still Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket last year specifically for a trip. It was the perfect jacket! Has everything I needed in a jacked including lots of pockets, and I never found myself cold. I have arthritis so it’s really difficult to keep warm. This jacket has become one of my favorites. It was the perfect jacket! Worth every shekel.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Soll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I live on the Iron range of northern MN. First day I wore this coat it was - 2, with the wind chill putting it at around - 30. Paired with a thermal shirt and a light sweater, I was perfectly comfortable just standing outside. Started moving and working, I was sweating! Fits perfectly, love the thumb hole sleeves. Blocks wind amazingly, and keeps me perfectly dry in the snow. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: yet the outer fabric has a nice feel to it
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review for my wife. I purchased this item as a Christmas gift for her, as she absolutely hates the winter and being cold in general. She was looking for a warm, form fitting, and waterproof jacket to be her go-to for the nasty winter months. The fit and finish of this jacket is superb, and worth every penny. It is a true waterproof jacket, yet the outer fabric has a nice feel to it. I can happily report that she wears this jacket regularly, and cannot say enough good things about it. Do yourself a favor and get this jacket if you are looking for a high quality, sharp looking winter jacket.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears a xs to s on adult size clothing, i listened to review and sized up. I'm glad i sized up bc it fits like a small and i ordered a medium. Great quality, not bulky and very warm. My 7 year old saw her jacket and also like that it was not a bulky winter jacket and wanted one also. Will be purchasing one for my 7 year old son, husband and my self for next year. If your thinking about it, just buy it! you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Alex Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Top Winter Coat
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best winter coats I've ever owned. I was skeptical because of the relatively low price but it fit great, was not too heavy, ended up being very warm over a snowy Adirondack Christmas and has pockets in all the right places, including a great exterior chest pocket for your phone. I used it while rolling around with the dogs in deep snow, where the hood and skirt and adjustable cuffs kept the snow from getting in anywhere and I used it on snowshoe hikes when it was really cold and just unzipped a little if I got too warm. This is a fantastic winter coat.
customer_reviews.author: Eradikate

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!

Great for skiing, back country wear and normal everyday use. Complete with powder skirt, hood (that can be detached), Velcro security strap on back of hood to secure ski googles. Lots of pockets. Just a great all around jacket for any and everyday wear. Couldn’t be more pleased. Would highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: WARM!

This was a VERY close second to the $330 coat I purchased. If you want a very warm coat for a small price, look no further.

If you are planning on hiking up a mountain such as Mt Fuji I would recommend this jacket as it adapts well through the temperature and wind changes with the thermal lining.

customer_reviews.title: In the sweet spot.

customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best $130 I've spent in a long time. It's very warm, comfortable, fits well (I'm 5'9", 160lbs with a DD chest and broad hips, normally wear a large/size 12 in women's) with a little extra layering room, and it has great pockets for my keys, smartphone, lip balm, and cards. This thing keeps my torso and neck/throat warm when it's 30 and even 25 degrees outside (haven't been in it in colder weather yet). Even the pockets are super soft and warm. It's amazing. I can't compare it to other ski jackets, as this is my first, but it has made me realize I never want to be without one again! -Love & Embolden

customer_reviews.title: Go Columbia!

I did get hot in the coat which makes me think in colder weather it will hold up just fine. It definitely kept my heat in. I’m 5’10 and a size 14. I bought a size XL and it fit perfect.

customer_reviews.title: This coat is worth it.

product_meta.title: Columbia Women's Alpine Action Omni-Heat Jacket
product_meta.description: A warm winter coat with a sophisticated air-the waterproof alpine action jacket is crafted with our patented thermal-reflective technology and 100g of synthetic insulation for all-day warmth. The jacket's premium cross-dye fabric features a lovely texture and full waterproof breathability, while a suite of ski-and-snowboard-ready features anticipate your other on-mountain needs.
feature_bullets: ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY: This women's winter jacket features our signature Omni-Tech fabric for a waterproof, breathable construction and Oni-Heat Reflective Thermal Reflective Warmth that reflects your body heat to keep you warm.
HANDY FEATURES: This waterproof jacket features an interior security pocket, zippered chest pocket, zippered hand pockets, media and goggle pocket, and a ski pocket for added security.

ADJUSTABLE FEATURES: This waterproof breathable jacket features a removable adjustable storm hood, drawcord adjustable hem, and an adjustable snap back powder skirt for ultimate protection and comfort.
ACTIVE FIT: This windproof, waterproof jacket features an active fit so you can be slope ready.
With premium insulation and top winter performance, this waterproof and windproof winter jacket is a necessity for you mountain activities.
